select tor.pc_no ,tor.loginID ,MAX(tor.seq) as seq ,tp.login_time ,tp.logout_time ,FORMAT(ROUND((100*TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, date_format(tp.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) / 60), -2), 0) as pcuseamt ,tor.foodamt as foodamt ,FORMAT(ROUND(((100*TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, date_format(tp.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) / 60) + foodamt),-2),0) as totalamt ,tor.cpl_yn from tb_order tor ,tb_pc tp where tor.pc_no = #{pc_no} and tor.pc_no = tp.pc_no group by tor.pc_no order by tp.login_time DESC limit 1

SELECT tp.pc_no , tp.login_time , tp.loginID , tp.seq , FORMAT(TRUNCATE( 1*(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, date_format(tp.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) / 60), -2), 0) as amt from tb_pc tp where tp.pc_no = #{pc_no} and tp.loginID = #{loginID} order by tp.login_time DESC limit 1
